game.beginning: In a world where magic has been outlawed, the city of Verneville is plagued by a mysterious force known as "The Devouring".
game.ending: With the source of The Devouring defeated and the magic restored, the people of Verneville begin to rebuild their lives.
game.synopsis:
In a desperate bid to save their home, a group of rebels must band together to uncover the truth behind The Devouring. As they delve deeper into the mystery, they discover that a powerful sorcerer is manipulating the force from the shadows.

The players take on the roles of these rebels, navigating treacherous landscapes and battling fearsome creatures to reach the sorcerer's stronghold. Along the way, they will encounter allies who possess ancient magical abilities, as well as rival factions vying for power in the city.

With every step forward, the stakes grow higher, and the fate of Verneville hangs precariously in the balance. Will the rebels be able to stop The Devouring and restore magic to their world?
game.title: Verneville's Requiem
